name: Week 1. Yellow flowers
description: Flowers I made inspired by Tyler Hobbs artwork. The main idea was to create some artwork containing flowers and I took Tylers work named Petal loops as an inspiration. I used an example code we did together with Bassima and Garrit during a workshop on the 28/8 as help and a structure to continue build my own code on.

name: Week 1. Different colored flowers
description: A variation of the first flowers I made inspired by Tyler Hobbs artwork. The chnages I made to variate it was to give the flowers different some different shades of pink in a randomized patter! Same thing here with coding structure, I used an example code we did together with Bassima and Garrit during a workshop on the 28/8 as help and a structure to continue build my own code on, and added some more lines and changes in this second version.

name: Week 1. Windmill flowers
description: The same flowers from the first version, but this time they are slowly rotation for a sort of windmill effect, kind of :D

name: Week 1. Squares and colors
description: Week one, artwork number 2 and variation 1! A variation of Vera Molnar square-art :D

name: Week 1. Squares, circles and colors!
description: Week one, artwork number 2 and variation 2! A second variation of Molnars art with squares and now also circles

name: Week 1. Discolights with squares and circles
description: Week one, artwork number 2 and variation 3! A second thirs of Molnars art with squares, circles and I added a bouncing effect to give them sort of a flickering discolight look :)

name: Week 2. Flow Field inspired by Tyler Hobbs
description: A flowfield with particles moving slowly and almost kind of bouncy. Firstly moving freely and then they find the same path

name: Week 2. Flow field with choosable direction
description: You can now decide the direction of the flowers by moving your mouse, and can also kind of collect all the particles into one line if you want to!

name: Week 3. Perlin Noise particles
description: Some particles with Perlin noise that also follows your mouse if you were to move it! Click on the screen :)

name: Week 4. Some sound lines
description: Click on a line and you will create some noise! The further down you go the darker the sound gets
